Remote Work Policy

1. Equipment Provision
The Company shall provide each remote employee with a laptop, monitor, and ergonomically‑approved chair. Employees are required to return all equipment upon termination of employment or within 30 days of request.

2. Security Obligations
Remote workers must use company‑approved VPN, enable full‑disk encryption, and follow the Acceptable Use Policy. Any breach must be reported within 24 hours.

3. Expense Reimbursement
Employees may submit monthly expenses for internet service, electricity up to $100, and office supplies. Receipts must be uploaded to the expense portal within 10 business days.

4. Jurisdiction and Governing Law
All disputes arising under this policy shall be governed by the laws of the State of California, United States, and resolved in the courts of San Francisco County.

5. Confidentiality
[Standard confidentiality clause...]
